metadata.Title: CVE-2016-8682 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
The ReadSCTImage function in coders/sct.c in GraphicsMagick 1.3.25 allowsremote attackers to cause a denial of service (out-of-bounds read) via acrafted SCT header.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-8682` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

graphicsmagick - 1.3.25-5
graphicsmagick-imagemagick-compat - 1.3.25-5
libgraphics-magick-perl - 1.3.25-5
libgraphicsmagick++-q16-12 - 1.3.25-5
libgraphicsmagick-q16-3 - 1.3.25-5
No subscription required

criterions.comment: graphicsmagick package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.3.25-5').
